articles.description: The finding comes amidst a growing popularity of plant-based diets and a changing food environment with more access to plant-based alternatives
articles.content: At the same time, compared to those who eat meat, these kids had almost two-fold higher odds of having underweight, defined as below the third percentile for Body Mass Index. There was, however, no e… [+814 chars]
